com.wegas.core.ejb

Class BaseFacade<T extends AbstractEntity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wegas.core.ejb.BaseFacade<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractFacade<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccountFacade, AdminFacade, GameFacade, GameModelFacade, MessageFacade, PlayerFacade, QuestionDescriptorFacade, RoleFacade, TeamFacade, UserFacade, VariableDescriptorFacade, VariableInstanceFacade

    public abstract class BaseFacade<T extends AbstractEntity>
extends Object
implements AbstractFacade<T>
    This is the default implementation of the AbstractFacade pattern defined in Wegas, to be extended.
    Author:
    Francois-Xavier Aeberhard
